f2 = (0110 1101)
f1 = (1011 0110)
	
000 1
001 0
010 1
011 1
100 0
101 1
110 1
111 0

f1 = !x2(1001) V x2(1110) = !x2(!(x1 V x3) V x1x3) V x2*!(x1x3)
f2 = !x2(0111) V x2(1001) = !x2(x1 V x3) V x2(!(x1 V x3) V x1x3)

f = (0101 0110 0111 0111)

f = (0110 1011 0110 1010)

f = !x3!x4(0101) V !x3x4(1010) V x3x4(0100) V x3!x4(1111) = !x3!x4x2 V !x3x4!x2 V x3!x4 V x3x4(!x1x2) = !x3(!(x2x1)(x2 V x4)) V x3(!x4 V (x2x4)!x1)

0000 0	0000
0001 1  0011
0010 1  0101
0011 0  1000
0100 1  1011
0101 0  1101
0110 1  1111
0111 1
1000 0
1001 1
1010 1
1011 0
1100 1
1101 0
1110 1
1111 0
